00028 namespace lsf {
00029 namespace util {
00030 
00031 class System {
00032 public:
00033     static const int DEF_MAX_NOFILE = 1024;
00034     static const int DEF_MAX_CORE_SIZE = 1 << 26;  // 64MB
00035     using handler_type = void(int);
00036 
00037 public:
00039     // filesystem related
00040     static bool ChDir(std::string const& path) {
00041         if (::chdir(path.c_str()) < 0) return false;
00042         return true;
00043     }
00044 
00045     static std::string GetAbsPath(std::string const& path) {
00046         char buffer[PATH_MAX];
00047         return ::realpath(path.c_str(), buffer) == nullptr ? "" : buffer;
00048     }
00049 
00050     static std::string GetPwd() {
00051         char buffer[PATH_MAX];
00052         return ::getcwd(buffer, sizeof(buffer)) == nullptr ? "" : buffer;
00053     }
00054 
00055     static bool IsFile(std::string const& path) { return S_ISREG(GetFileMode(path)); }
00056     static bool IsDir(std::string const& path) { return S_ISDIR(GetFileMode(path)); }
00057     static bool IsSock(std::string const& path) { return S_ISSOCK(GetFileMode(path)); }
00058 
00059     static bool IsExist(std::string const& path) { return ::access(path.c_str(), F_OK) == 0; }
00060     static bool IsReadable(std::string const& path) { return ::access(path.c_str(), R_OK) == 0; }
00061     static bool IsWritable(std::string const& path) { return ::access(path.c_str(), W_OK) == 0; }
00062     static bool IsExecutable(std::string const& path) { return ::access(path.c_str(), X_OK) == 0; }
00063 
00064     static mode_t GetFileMode(std::string const& path) {
00065         struct stat tmp;
00066         if (::stat(path.c_str(), &tmp) < 0) return 0;
00067         return tmp.st_mode;
00068     }
00069 
00070     static bool MkDir(std::string const& path) {
00071         if (IsDir(path)) return true;
00072 
00073         std::string dirname = util::StringExt::GetDirName(path);
00074 
00075         if (IsExist(dirname) && !IsDir(dirname)) return false;
00076 
00077         // mk parent dir first
00078         if (!IsExist(dirname))
00079             if (!MkDir(dirname)) return false;
00080 
00081         // finally mk the dir
00082         if (::mkdir(path.c_str(), 0755) < 0) return false;
00083 
00084         return true;
00085     }
00086 
00087     static bool Rm(std::string const& path) { return RunShellCmd(std::string("rm -rf ") + path); }
00088 
00089     static bool Rename(std::string const& old_path, std::string const& new_path) {
00090         return std::rename(old_path.c_str(), new_path.c_str()) >= 0;
00091     }
00092 
00093     static bool RunShellCmd(std::string const& cmd) {
00094         if (cmd.empty()) return false;
00095 
00096         return ::system(cmd.c_str()) >= 0;
00097     }
00098 
00099     template<typename FuncType>
00100     static bool ForFilesWithinFold(std::string const& folder_path, FuncType&& func) {
00101         DIR* pdir = ::opendir(folder_path.c_str());
00102         struct dirent ent;
00103         struct dirent* pend = nullptr;
00104         while (::readdir_r(pdir, &ent, &pend) == 0) {
00105             if (pend == nullptr) return true; // end of dir
00106             if (::strcmp(pend->d_name, "..") == 0) continue; // ignore .
00107             if (::strcmp(pend->d_name, ".") == 0) continue; // ignore ..
00108             func(folder_path + '/' + pend->d_name);
00109         }
00110         return false;
00111     }
00112 
00114     // signal related
00115     static bool SetSignal(int sig_num, handler_type sig_handler) {
00116         struct sigaction sa;
00117         std::memset(&sa, 0, sizeof(sa));
00118         sa.sa_handler = sig_handler;
00119         ::sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
00120         // restart interrupted system call
00121         sa.sa_flags = SA_RESTART;
00122         if (::sigaction(sig_num, &sa, nullptr) < 0) return false;
00123         return true;
00124     }
00125 
00127     // system related funcs
00128     static bool SetMaxNofile(int max_nofile = DEF_MAX_NOFILE) {
00129         rlimit rlim;
00130         rlim.rlim_cur = max_nofile;
00131         rlim.rlim_max = max_nofile;
00132 
00133         if (-1 == ::setrlimit(RLIMIT_NOFILE, &rlim)) return false;
00134         return true;
00135     }
00136 
00137     static bool SetMaxCore(int max_core = DEF_MAX_CORE_SIZE) {
00138         rlimit rlim;
00139         rlim.rlim_cur = max_core;
00140         rlim.rlim_max = max_core;
00141 
00142         if (-1 == ::setrlimit(RLIMIT_CORE, &rlim)) return false;
00143         return true;
00144     }
00145 
00146     static std::pair<int, int> GetMaxNofile() {
00147         rlimit rlim;
00148         ::getrlimit(RLIMIT_NOFILE, &rlim);
00149         return std::make_pair(rlim.rlim_cur, rlim.rlim_max);
00150     }
00151 
00152     static std::pair<int, int> GetMaxCore() {
00153         rlimit rlim;
00154         ::getrlimit(RLIMIT_CORE, &rlim);
00155         return std::make_pair(rlim.rlim_cur, rlim.rlim_max);
00156     }
00157 
00158     static void Daemonize() {
00159         // clear file creation mask
00160         ::umask(0);
00161 
00162         // become session leader to give up controlling tty
00163         if (::fork() != 0) std::exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00164         ::setsid();
00165 
00166         // redirect STDIN, STDOUT, STDERR
00167         int fd = ::open("/dev/null", O_RDWR);
00168         ::close(STDIN_FILENO);
00169         ::close(STDOUT_FILENO);
00170         ::close(STDERR_FILENO);
00171         ::dup2(fd, STDIN_FILENO);
00172         ::dup2(fd, STDOUT_FILENO);
00173         ::dup2(fd, STDERR_FILENO);
00174         ::close(fd);
00175     }
00176 
00177     static bool IsRoot() { return ::geteuid() == 0; }
00178 
00180     // network related
00181     static bool GetAllAddress(std::vector<lsf::asio::Address>& address_vec) {
00182         // get all ifs
00183         struct ifaddrs* all_ifa = nullptr;
00184         if (::getifaddrs(&all_ifa) < 0) return false;
00185         LSF_SCOPE_EXIT() { freeifaddrs(all_ifa); };
00186 
00187         // traverse all ifs
00188         for (auto* ifa = all_ifa; ifa != nullptr; ifa = ifa->ifa_next) {
00189             if (!ifa->ifa_addr) continue;
00190 
00191             // ipv4
00192             if (ifa->ifa_addr->sa_family == AF_INET) {
00193                 address_vec.emplace_back(((struct sockaddr_in*)ifa->ifa_addr)->sin_addr);
00194             }
00195             // ipv6
00196             else if (ifa->ifa_addr->sa_family == AF_INET6) {
00197                 address_vec.emplace_back(((struct sockaddr_in6*)ifa->ifa_addr)->sin6_addr);
00198             }
00199         }
00200 
00201         return true;
00202     }
00203 
00204     static lsf::asio::Address GetExternalAddress() {
00205         // get all
00206         std::vector<lsf::asio::Address> address_vec;
00207         if (!GetAllAddress(address_vec)) return lsf::asio::Address();
00208 
00209         // get first external
00210         for (auto const& address : address_vec) {
00211             if (address.IsV4() && !address.IsPrivate() && !address.IsLoopback()) return address;
00212         }
00213 
00214         return lsf::asio::Address();
00215     }
00216 
00217     static lsf::asio::Address GetInternalAddress() {
00218         // get all
00219         std::vector<lsf::asio::Address> address_vec;
00220         if (!GetAllAddress(address_vec)) return lsf::asio::Address();
00221 
00222         // get first internal
00223         for (auto const& address : address_vec) {
00224             if (address.IsV4() && address.IsPrivate()) return address;
00225         }
00226 
00227         return lsf::asio::Address();
00228     }
00229 };

00231 }  // end of namespace util
00232 }  // end of namespace lsf
